title: Frontend Developer
description: We are looking for a skilled Frontend Developer with experience in React and modern web technologies to join our dynamic team.

details.company_description: Firstclusive Branding is a leading provider of innovative IT solutions, serving over 800 clients worldwide since 2014. We specialise in Digital Marketing, Web Design, App Development, Branding and Printing services for businesses across various industries.
details.role_description: This is a full-time on-site role. The Frontend Developer will be responsible for implementing UI components and features using modern JavaScript frameworks and collaborating with designers and backend developers to deliver high-performance applications.
qualifications: Proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks like React.js, Vue.js, or Angular.
Experience with state management libraries such as Redux or Context API.
Strong understanding of responsive design and cross-browser compatibility.
Familiarity with RESTful APIs and backend integration.
Experience with version control systems like Git.
Ability to write clean, maintainable, and efficient code.
bonus: Knowledge of TypeScript and testing frameworks.
